trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Salt Lake City
There were no other sightings in Salt Lake City on or around June 8th 2013
Summary: fire ball with tail then hovered
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a cigarette when I noticed something from an extreme altitude coming down to the earth. It had a tail on it. At first I thought it may be a meteor because the tail was wobbeling. The object was bright and as it got closer to the ground the tail got smaller and smaller. Then the object stopped falling and hovered where I could barley see it over some trees. It looked red, orange. After watching it for about 7 minutes I decided to go inside.
